In Metro Domino, you use domino tiles to build metro lines across the city.

Each player starts with nine dominoes from a 9x9 set, and one random domino is placed in the central starting station. On a turn, you can draw a domino from the boneyard (i.e., the supply of dominoes) or place a domino at the end of an active line as long as you can match the number at the end of the line; the starting station can have two lines built off of the starting domino. If you place a double domino, take another turn immediately.

The starting station indicates that five dominoes must be placed in a line before a new station is opened. If you place the fifth domino in a line, draw a random station from the deck, then place it at the end of the line and mark it with one of your tokens. Each station has two lines off of it, with a starting domino half on each line and a length the line must reach before a new station is built on that line.

Players continue to take turns until either one player has emptied their hand of dominoes or the fifth station has been put into play. At the time, players score, earning 1 point for each station they started and losing 1 point for each domino still in hand.

Each city edition of Metro Domino appears to have identical gameplay, but with differing station lengths and values.

name: Curse of the Wymer Stones
description:
A retro dungeon crawling board game for 2-5 players. Play as one of four heroes or even as the villain!​

As one of the heroes, you will make your way through the catacombs, working together to fend off dangerous creatures and traps as you search for your Wymer Stone. You must use your stone to defeat the Cursed Dwarves and save the kingdoms of Overwyrld from the evil Wymer.

As the villain, you set traps and locks for the heroes to battle. Also, you will control the Cursed Dwarves as you attempt to defeat the heroes and doom Overwyrld to destruction by the Wymer.

DIFFERENT OUTCOMES
Encounters have two outcomes. If the hero wins, the thumbs up side of the card is read. If the hero loses, the thumbs down portion is read. Even the game itself has outcomes based on if the heroes are victorious or not.

SIMPLE SCORING
Encounters are decided by one die for the hero and one die for the villain. They roll against each other, and any bonuses are added to the roll to see who wins the encounter. The math never gets bigger than adding up to twelve, which is good, because math is terrible.

THE BOARD GAME WE ALWAYS WANTED TO PLAY
When we designed this game, we made it for players like us. We wanted it to be easy to learn, simple to play and challenging enough that we would want to play again.

With a lot of effort and fine-tuning, we arrived at a game that we would have loved if it had existed when we were 14. Does that mean you'll love it? We hope so. If you're looking for a complicated, intricate and punishing game, this probably isn't the game you're looking for. If you want a retro roll to resolve adventure with a compelling story that is simple to learn and play, this is the game for you!

—description from the designer

name: The Ugly Duckling
description:
The Ugly Duckling is a flip & write game inspired by the famous fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen.

Draw polyomino shapes around the animals on the farm and in the country side. You want to fill the board but also to draw around specific animals - each round a new animal will score you extra points.

About the fairy tale:
The Ugly Duckling hatches at a duck family that wants nothing to do with him, because he is different. Chased out into the world, he thus begins a long journey that lasts all winter, throughout which he tries to find out where he belongs. The duckling experiences lots of grievances before finally seeing his own reflection and discovering he is a beautiful swan.

—description from the publisher

name: Yigo
description: Yigo is fast paced word building card game. It is mixture between UNO and scrabble with 7 different action cards that help you build the words. First player to lose all cards wins the game.
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Educational, Word Game

name: Little Bakers
description:
Simply collect the ingredient cards to match the recipe you're cooking, by taking turns to pick up new cards and discard unwanted ones.

The winning baker will have collected everything they need to create their chosen bake in their hand of 6 cards. Leaving everyone else with a muddle of ingredients.

Children learn skills like turn-taking, coordination, and memory. They Can also try the selection of simple recipes included!

—description from the publisher

name: Bye-Bye Black Sheep: 2022 Promo card – Cheese Thief
description:
Cheese Thief:
If this card is drawn one of the players who has the most different animal types in his zoo has to discard one animal card and has to put it under the deck. The player who has drawn the card will choose the animal card to be discarded.

name: Railroad Madness
description:
Railroad Madness is a family game for 2-4 players about building and running railway lines in the Old West. Players each take on the role of a wannabe railroad tycoon! The game will have you picking up pioneers seeking to make their fortunes in the Gold Rush and transporting them to new frontiers as fast as you dare.

This game was not published due to publisher bankruptcy.

-description from publisher
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Pick-up and Deliver, Real-Time

name: Twilight of the Britons
description:
Fast play miniatures wargames rules for the Dark Age (AD 410-1054) British islands.

Like the other games in the "Twilight" family, close combat and shooting are folded into the morale rules: the effect of being shot at or attacked in melee is simply to check morale. Units that fail too many morale checks rout and are removed.

As is appropriate for the "Arthurian" era, there is considerable scope for heroic leaders to affect the course of battle.

The rules are compatible with any basing as long as all units have the same frontage.

name: Celestials
description:
The time of the void is ending, which Celestial will take its place! Using the power of one of the celestials, deceive, deduct and question your opponents to collect the correct cards and take your place as head of the Celestials.

—description from the designer

name: Pop-A-Tops: Dino Scores
description:
Pop the top to “roll” the dice to choose a category, then race to grab the dinosaur card you think will score the highest!

The player with the highest score that matches the dice roll gets to keep the card. The player who collects the most cards at the end wins!

Which dinosaur is the biggest, or the fastest? Outsmart your opponents with your Dino Facts!

— description from the publisher

On a player's turn they roll the die which shows a category (size, speed, weight, attack, defence, player's chioce). Immediately each player has to grab a dinosaur with the highest value (or - in rule variant - active player tells everyone to grab highest/lowesst value) of the indicated parameter. When each player grabs one card, they flip them and check the value. The player that chose the best dinosaur keeps the card. The first player to keep 5 or 7 cards (depending on the number of players) wins the game.

— user summary
categories: Animals, Card Game, Children's Game, Party Game, Real-time, Trivia

name: Escape the Minotaur's Maze
description:
A competitive fast-paced dungeon crawling game for two to four players. Game plays in 30-45 minutes.

Each game begins with a maze generated from randomly drawn dungeon cards. The players take turns exploring and moving through the maze. They can play cards from their hand to replace explored tiles to make it easier for them to escape or hinder the competing players.

The first to recover the magical Chalice and escape is the winner.

Play one of four different characters with unique attack and defense abilities to help you survive the minotaur’s fury.

-description from publisher

name: Magic: The Gathering – Double Masters 2022
description: This sequel to 2020's Double Masters reprises the themes of powerful reprints and extra rares in every pack. Double Masters 2022 contains 331 reprints from across Magic's history (91 commons, 80 uncommons, 120 rares, 40 mythic rares) and is sold in draft boosters and collector boosters. Each 16-card draft booster is guaranteed to contain 2 foils and 2–4 rare or mythic rare cards, and in a booster draft, players take 2 cards on their first pick from each pack rather than 1. Each 15-card collector booster is guaranteed to contain 12 foils and 4 rare or mythic rare cards (3 foil and 1 non-foil).
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Closed Drafting, Deck Construction, Hand Management, Income, Interrupts, Player Elimination, Take That

name: Pick Eat
description:
Pick Eat is a card game about food nutrition and balance healthy diet.

Just as in our daily life's diet habit, in game, players take turn to "treat" opponents some food, meanwhile have to decide and choose our preference food type, in the aim of building a healthy and balance diet combination.

Pick Eat is a "I cut you choose" drafting game that themed on nutrition pyramid. In turn, players look at the top three cards, then decide and offer them, one face-up and two face-down, to next opponent. The opponent then decide, whether to take the only one face-up, or to choose one secretly from the two face-down cards.

If opponent chooses the face-up card, active player gets to choose one from the two face-down cards. If opponent decides to get one from the two face-down cards, active player gets the one face-up cards. Card(s) collected through face-up will form "Open Food Menu" and card(s) collected through face-down will form "Hidden Food Menu".

Game goes few rounds depends on player count, and at the final turn, players will get two cards each from the discard piles, then distribute them one each to the left and right opponent, and all players to be adding the two cards received from opponents into the Food Menu, finally forming the full diet. Scoring then occurs and player with the highest score wins.

Are you ready to learn to be more responsible for own diet?

“We PICK what we EAT”

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, I Cut, You Choose, Open Drafting, Set Collection

name: Silhouetters
description: Silhouetters is a fast all play word game, where players shout out what they see and what they can imagine! Roll the 3 letter dice and find things that start with those letters hiding in the shadows. The more you spot the more points you win!
categories: Card Game, Dice, Party Game, Word Game

name: The R.I.P. Off
description: The R.I.P. Off is a board game where 3-8 players try to survive a generic Slasher Movie. Choose from over 15 cliché Main Characters and try to level up your stats before the qually cliché Killer arrives and...well... tries to kill all of you. Whether you choose to fight back or escape in car, you'll need to search the cabin in the woods in order to make it to the end of the film.

name: Who's the Silly Goose?
description:
Are you becoming your parents? Call your friends out for getting old and developing habits like "Spends all day fantasizing about homes on Zillow" or "Has a crippling addiction to throw pillows".

Includes 150 most likely to prompt cards with viral meme characters like Rand and Nance.

—description from the publisher

Each round, a card is drawn showing some undesirable habit. Every player (except for the judge for that round) makes a case for which other player exhibits that habit most strongly. After hearing the arguments, the judge determines who gets the card. Then, the next player becomes the judge, and a new round begins. When a player has accumated seven cards, that player loses the game, and the game ends.

—user summary

name: Pictionary Family
description:
Pictionary Family is a modified version of the original game, designed for play with both adults and children together. Players divide into two teams, preferably with children divided equally among the two or four teams. Each turn there is one Picturist and the rest of the team players as Guessers.

The game consists of rolling a die to circle a linear track on the board. Topics to draw come from cards. An hourglass marks the time limit for guessing. The cards contain family friendly topics, suitable for both children and adults. Guessing correctly earns the next roll. The game is advertised for Ages 8 and up.
mechanics: Line Drawing, Roll / Spin and Move, Team-Based Game

name: Katas
description:
Katas is a game about tidying up, putting your food in the refrigerator and your clothes in the wardrobe.

Players reveal a number of cards equal to the players, and then take turns either pulling a chip from a bag to place on one of the cards or taking a card and the chips on it. After everyone has taken a card, they can activate the effect of one of the cards they've taken.

After a number of rounds the game ends and players earn points for items in the correct location, lose points for items in the wrong location, and may earn a bonus. The player with the most points wins.

name: Pamięć Dźwiękowa
description: Pamięć Dźwiękowa ("Sound Memory") is a great way to have fun while learning attentive listening and sound memorization techniques. It helps develop the aural memory and improve hand-eye-ear coordination. The players try to memorize sounds and match them in pairs.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Pizza Party
description:
In this TMNT themed memory game, 2-4 players try to get ingredients for their pizzas.

On their turn, a player rolls either a D6 with numbers 1-3 or a regular D6 to grab that many ingredients for their pizza, but making sure there are no duplicates or flies in the newly flipped ingredients (you can have duplicates with the ingredients already on the pizza). The first player to have 12 ingredients wins the game.

If you flip a fly, your turn ends and you get no ingredients, but you have to put the fly on the pizza of a another player that doesn’t already have one.

If you have a fly on your pizza, you have to roll the regular D6.
categories: Children's Game, Memory, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Splattered Smocks
description: Klecks paints beautiful colorful pictures, but the little painter needs a lot of paint! The children move Klecks from paint tube to paint tube by turning over the picture cards and naming the colors. They collect blots of color on their smocks in the process. But be careful – Toffy the puppy likes stealing brushes! The first player to collect seven blots on their painting coat wins.
mechanics: Point to Point Movement, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: 花鳥風月 (Kacho Fugetsu)
description:
In 花鳥風月 (Kacho Fugetsu), players roll a die, moving that many spaces and performing the action shown on that space. Players may then spend money to build a monument which may have various one time effects, round effects, or effects when the space is landed on.

Some turns will not be useful and there is no way to adjust the roll of the die.

A player whose money marker and honor point marker meet wins the game.
publishers: イマジンゲームズ (imagine GAMES)

name: Dragon Slayer
description:
A licensed board game adaptation of the PC-88 videogame by Falcom, Dragon Slayer.

The players move on a grid board to explore a dungeon and battle the dragon to keep their treasure.

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Summer Cyrus Promo Cards
description:
Beta Rules - 3 x Gear Cards that were included with the Summer Cyrus First Run Collector's Edition that was not part of the based game.

Gear card sample: Sighing Acanthus Hat (herb, flammable, accessory)- When you draw the trap, gain a reroll token. If wearing no armor, gain 2.

The First Run Collector's Edition is enclosed in a hand-stamped kraft box, limited to 500 and includes:

Photoresin Summer Cyrus
1 x Hard Plastic Kingdom Death 30mm round insert and base
Large Matte Art Print
Character Art Card
Beta Rules - 3x Gear Card
First run collector's edition: Signed and numbered authenticity note

A refreshing dip along the coast of the saliva shores. Cyrus has ventured out without her Magma Lobster Armor, favoring a more lightweight, sighing attire. The primary danger on the beach are the leaping acid crabs, but it's common knowledge that they don't scavenge the beach when the tides are red.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Cactus Stack
description:
Several cards that slot into each other to create a 3D 'cactus'.

Each player starts with 7 cards and must insert a card on their turn, matching the flower on the bottom of their card with the flower on the notch they are sliding it into.

If someone doesn't have a card matching the colour, they draw another card.

A few special abilities exit (play 2x, skip next player, reverse play, and 'prune' (get rid of an entire branch and deal it out to the players, ideally giving everyone else one more card).

If cards fall, or touch the playing surface, they must be collected and added to your hand.

First player to run out of cards wins.

name: UNO: Spirit Untamed
description: It's UNO with a Spirit themed artwork and a special Spirit card added, "Wild Best Friends Card." This card lets you call out a number and all players can lay down a card of that number, then you get to pick the color to use to continue play.
categories: Card Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Beer Yoga
description:
Take off your shoes and pop a cold one it's time for your favorite new party game. Beer Yoga is a game best enjoyed with a cold beverage, and lots of friends. Roll to see who goes first and draw your yoga card. Think you can pull off a pose with drink in hand? That's for the other players to decide! The winner has the most beer chips at the end. Substitute any beverage, or alter challenging poses to make this game great for every adult!

Kikkerland's Beer Yoga is a light-hearted party game for adults. Each game comes in a decorated 'beer can' case with one die, pose cards, beer chips and instructions.

Downward dog, shoulder stand, mountain....but can you bend with a beer? Beer Yoga is a fun game for couples nights or a fun active party. Do your friends think you're nailing that pose? Impress other players to earn points and win! Beer Yoga can be played with any soda, juice or drink of your choice - just stay hydrated! Modify poses to make this game great for every adult player in your group.

—description from the publisher
categories: Action / Dexterity, Mature / Adult, Party Game

name: 東方酔符宴 (Toho Suifuen)
description:
東方酔符宴 (Toho Suifuen - Oriental Banquet of Drunken Sign)

Gensokyo's Spell Card Wars explode! The new mechanism of the Oriental fan board game "Oriental Drunken Talisman Banquet" is about to start a bloody battle!

In a turn all players declare and activate spells. They may then discard any number cards in their hands. If they do so, they draw as many cards as they discarded. When a player's HP becomes 0, he is shot down. Player that took them gets some VPs and player that has been shot down returns with max HP.

When a turn ends and there are players with 30 VP or more, the game ends. Player with highest VP wins.

—user summary

幻想鄉的符卡大戰震撼引爆！
全新機制的東方同人桌遊《東方醉符宴》
PF18 即將展開熱血激鬥！

在遊戲中選擇最符合您戰鬥風格的東方美少女角色
組出手牌中最適合您策略的符卡進擊

派出魔理沙以強大的破壞力橫掃千軍
運用射命丸文神速先制搶奪殘血對手的尾刀
整備東風谷早苗滴水不漏的防禦累積得點
選擇靈夢均衡的攻守兼備見機行事

伴隨著手氣天運的抽牌擲骰與聰明策畫的符卡組合互相搭配
才是在競爭激烈的大亂鬥中生存下來的不二法門
在這場幻想鄉大激戰脫穎而出，邁向勝利寶座吧

–description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Fantasy, Fighting, Video Game Theme

name: Зловещие призраки (Sinister Ghosts)
description:
Зловещие призраки (Sinister Ghosts) is a fast card game in which players have to survive during the round, escaping from ghosts.
Both "Escape" cards and "Fear" cards will help players survive, thanks to which players will be able to steal from rivals.
The main thing in this game is to stay alive at any cost! Fight with intangible monsters or run. And remember: you don't need to be the fastest, it's important that someone is slower than you.
During the game, players hold ghost cards, other players' fear cards, and ghost escape cards. Every turn, players must play cards and if a player plays a ghost, then he puts it in front of him, if at the beginning of the next turn he plays an escape, then he will escape from the ghost and get a winning point. The player who has escaped from the greatest number of ghosts wins.

name: Robin Hood: Der doppelte Hinterhalt
description:
Escape Room style game with a Robin Hood theme where Robin and his friend get ambushed.
—user summary

Ein Hinterhalt im Sherwood Forest
Robin Hood lauert mit seinen Gefährten einer Kutsche auf. Doch schon zu Beginn des Überfalls wird klar: Hier stimmt etwas nicht. Sie wurden erwartet. Als es ihren Gegnern gelingt zu entkommen, offenbart einer der Gefährten ein schreckliches Geheimnis. Da hat bestimmt der Sheriff von Nottingham seine Finger im Spiel! In diesem spannenden Escape Room-Kartenspiel schlüpft ihr in die Rolle von Robin Hood und müsst euch durch unzählige Hindernisse und Rätsel kämpfen, um eure Gefährten aus dem Verlies des Sheriffs zu retten. Nur wenn ihr einen scharfen Verstand, Einfallsreichtum und Gewitztheit beweist, kann euch das gelingen.
—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Book, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Top Trumps Quiz: The Lord of the Rings
description: One does not simply answer all 500 questions in TOP TRUMPS QUIZ: Lord of the Rings correctly on the first try! Give your sword-arm a rest and test your cunning and intellect with this tricksy game, which covers all three Lord of the Rings films. Think you can remember the name of the second chapter of Bilbo’s book, or the three-word order Théoden delivers at Helm’s Deep? Stock up on Lembas, because you’re in for quite a journey. Each card contains high-quality photography and stills from the movies, and categories cover characters, locations, creatures and the world and history of Middle Earth. Know the name of the statue on the River Anduin? Remember which city lies between the Mountains of Mordor and Minas Tirith? Then it’s time to gather your very own Fellowship and assemble a quiz night to remember. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us - and this Lord of the Rings quiz is sure to make Frodo and Gandalf proud.
categories: Fantasy, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Trivia

name: James Bond 007 Card Game
description: Players try and either put together winning card combinations or bluff their way to the win. Opponents have to decide which they are doing. Amassing the most chips wins you the game.

name: Charmed and Dangerous: Princess Pack
description:
Looking for additional Princesses or perhaps some alternate abilities with cool variation card art? Then pick up this Princess Pack to expand and add on to your Charmed and Dangerous: The Sisters Grimm game! This pack includes 7 Princesses and a new Villainess, Carabossa all in their tarot card sized glory!

As an added bonus the original Tarot sized Princess and Villainess cards are included as well for a total of 14 cards!
categories: Adventure, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Hand Management, Role Playing, Variable Player Powers

name: Snail Mail
description:
Four Snail Mail Carriers are out on their routes and it's your job to help them make their deliveries.

Your Snail Mail Carrier's bag will be filled with four cards, each containing a number and a color. To complete deliveries, you'll need your cards to match the goal on a Delivery Card.

For example, do all your Mail Cards have the colors green and blue? Then you've matched the "All Green and Blue" Delivery card and win that card.

Lots of different Delivery Cards allow for a different game every time. The first player to complete six deliveries wins the game.

Contents: 4 Plastic Snail Shaped Card Racks, Deck of 48 Mail Cards, Deck of 23 Delivery Cards, Illustrated Instructions.

-description from publisher

name: Monsterjäger: Das Kartenspiel
description: In Monsterjäger: Das Kartenspiel, you hunt for red, blue, and yellow monsters as quickly as you can, attacking the cards of other players by slapping them or defending your own cards by getting your hand on the table first.

name: Chordsway: (NOT) A Music Thoery Card Game
description:
Chordsway is a fast-paced and simply card game for everyone. Despite designed based on music theory, it DOES NOT require musical knowledge. The goal is to match the cards to make chords and finish all the cards in hand.

—description from the publisher

name: Core Connection: Nabla Conspiracy
description:
In this robot anime-inspired deckbuilding card game for 2-4 players, you can pick between 6 different pilots and robots as the game progresses - 36 possibilities in all. And in true robot anime fashion, each pilot and robot gets to Awaken and unleash its true abilities when things look bleakest, creating truly memorable moments of hot-blooded action. Only you and your friends can defeat the encroaching hordes and thwart the plans of Nabla's Heart.

Two years ago, Atlantis, conquerors of the ancient world, rose from the depths of the Pacific. As the world stood paralyzed in the face of their onslaught, seven girls stepped forward to oppose it. They possessed the Royal Wavelength necessary to activate the humanoid weapons known as Resonants—the only means of stopping Atlantis. Caught in a maelstrom of conflict, they battled against the hordes, eventually slaying Ennosigaios, the Lord of Atlantis.

Now, peace slowly returns as the world licks its wounds and rebuilds. The girls enjoy a return to their normal lives… while feeling ever—so—slightly like something’s missing.

Through four phases of their turn, players purchase cards, add attachments to their mechs, play tactics and then enter battle! After the discard phase, play moves on. Defeat monsters to gain energy and gear up to battle stronger enemies together. First player to reach 20 energy announces the end of the game is coming - or reach 30 energy to win the game immediately!

-description from publisher

name: EXACTA!
description:
A fusion of trick-taking and racing games!

A racehorse who loves junk food. Use food cards to make them run!　
The horse with the most favorite food will be ranked higher! Predict 2 of the top 3
finishers. Speed ​​up for the next race! I have a feeling that the final race will be rough...? !

"EXACTA!" is a new genre: trick racing game that summarizes only the interesting parts of horse racing into 56 cards.

At the beginning of each race, each player will choose one food card from their hand and place it face down in front of them which will serve as a prediction for the race.

Each race consists of 7 tricks. At the end of each trick, sum up the values of each food type. The food type with the highest value wins the trick and the corresponding horse will move up 1 spot if not hungry or 2 spots if hungry. On the 7th trick, the corresponding horse always moves up 2 spots. The remaining card in each player's hand serves as a second prediction for the race.

If both predictions have matching types, the player scores 0. If both predictions are in the top 3 finishers, multiply the card values to get the score. If the first prediction wins the race and the second prediction gets second place, then multiply the score by 5. Double the score for each hungry horse in the prediction.

name: Chrononauts: Stonehenge 3-Pack
description:
Three card promo pack from Looney Labs that can be used with both Chrononauts and Early American Chononauts.

This trio of Chrononauts cards can be added to either version of the game. Each represents a sarsen stone that was removed from Stonehenge during the Dark Ages and lost to history. Each is slightly different; collect all 3 and you can recreate a trilithon. Doing so is a bonus Mission that becomes an alternate way to win. But you can also discard a Megalith in conjunction with Sell an Artifact for a whopping 3 card gain.

name: Oli
description:
Oli is a drawless connection game for two players: Black and White. It is played on the intersections (points) of an initially empty square grid (board). The top and bottom edges of the board are colored black; the left and right edges are colored white.

Black plays first, then turns alternate. On your turn, cover a 1×1, 1×2, 1×3 or 2×2 empty area of the board with stones of your color.

At the end of your turn, for any two diagonally adjacent stones of your color there must be another stone of your color adjacent to both, and there must be no 2×3 patterns of two empty points, two black stones a knight's jump away from each other and two white stones a knight's jump away from each other. Passing is not allowed, but, if you have no legal moves available, your turn is skipped.

You win if there is a chain of orthogonally connected stones of your color touching the two opposite board edges of your color.

To make the game fair, White will have the option, on their first turn only, to swap sides with Black instead of making a regular move.

-description from designer
mechanics: Chaining, Connections, Grid Coverage, Paper-and-Pencil, Pattern Building, Pattern Recognition, Square Grid, Tile Placement

name: POLITIKO 3.0: Peninsula Edition
description:
POLITIKO is a card game of wacky scheming and cynical realpolitik – in other words: it is a game about winning a Malaysian election!

Play as one of 10 distinct (yet familiar) political parties. Collect voters divided along ethnic and ideological lines.

Use dirty schemes to backstab your opponents. Promise free smartphones. Dole out GLC directorships. Deal with Ex-PMs. Court royalty.

New to POLITIKO 3.0: double cards! Turn schemes into voters; twist voters into schemes. But don’t get confused by your own spin – your backroom plots might backfire on you!

name: Đường Đua Tài Chính
description: In Đường Đua Tài Chính (Financial Race), players experience the path of cash flow through income, spending, investing, and giving.

name: I love Magyarország
description:
Roll the dice, move on the map of Hungary and answer the question related to one county.
Collect one card from each five category to win the game.
mechanics: Market, Questions and Answers, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Metagame: Videogame Expansion Set
description:
The Metagame expansion set contains 30 gorgeous game cards and 15 clever comparison cards for use with any other Metagame set.
The Metagames is game where you and your friends debate about games.
Information about getting more cards, as well as full rules for the basic game and many variants can be found at the metagame website.

name: Die drei Räuber
description: The game is a kind of memory. The difference to ordinary memory is that you have a deck of cards, four of which you hold in your hand. At the beginning of his turn, the player plays a card from his hand and then has to find the right card from the face-down cards on the table. If he succeeds, he can continue playing. At the end of his turn, he refills his hand to four. Whoever runs out of cards first is the winner.

name: Draw into Crime
description:
A crime has been committed! One of the players has witnessed the crime and has seen the perpetrator. Now the other players must ask the witness questions to try and identify the person responsible through their sketch drawing!

—description from the publisher

name: The Key: Theft in Cliffrock Villa – The Crown Witness
description:
"Commissioner, we were able to establish contact with a crown witness! But she is suspicious and asking for proof.
She won‘t tell us anything without assurances that we are actually investigating this case!"

"The Crown Witness" is an additional variant for "The Key – Theft in Cliffrock Villa".

This is a mini expansion for the very first "The Key" Game. It was a free promo on Spiel Essen 2022 and consists of 30 Cards: 6 rule cards, 6 Questions and 18 hints.

The Promo adds a new aspect to the game: At the start of the game one card is drawn that lets the crown witness ask a question concerning the case.

When playing you can focus to answer that question. When you can answer it, you note the answer and take a free info. only if you are last to answer, you get nothing.

It therefore adds a little race at the start of the game.

name: The Tree Trimming Game
description:
Get together with your friends and family around the Tree Trimming Game board. Help place ornament tiles on the tree to create a balanced design. Laugh and sing with Holiday Spirit cards! Everyone will be answering fun questions about the holidays or singing seasonal songs!

The Tree Trimming Game is a cooperative puzzle game for family and friends for 2 to 24 players. Take turns placing ornament tiles on the tree so that the same tiles are never next to each other! When an ornament tile is placed in a starred space the player draws a Holiday Spirit card. These cards have questions, song prompts, and other fun seasonal surprises!

The players win when they fill every spot on the tree with ornaments. The player with the fewest tiles puts the star on the tree! Happy Holidays!
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Questions and Answers, Singing, Tile Placement

name: Bende op de boerderij
description:
The farm is in chaos! The animals have wandered everywhere.
Now it’s up to you to bring them all back to their own paddocks.

You can play this game in two ways:
COOPERATIVE – make sure the animals get back to their own paddocks. But watch out! All animals must be back before dark or everyone loses!

COMPETITIVE – cross your fellow player(s) by blocking the paddock. Will you be the first to drive your livestock into their own paddocks?

-description from publisher
mechanics: Action Timer, Cooperative Game, Map Deformation

name: ShyCon: Nashville 2022
description:
A 18-card wallet compilation of 4 Button Shy games, delivered at ShyCon Nashville 2022:


Music City (4 cards)
Twin Stars: Adventure Series III – Scenario 13: Topple the Giant (3 cards)
In Vino Morte: Pixel edition (8 cards)
Wild Cats: George's Tattoo edition (3 cards)

name: Micronimo
description:
In Micronimo, capture insect cards 2 by 2 and group them by family to make the most beautiful collection.
The more insects a collection has, the more points it earns.
Also follow the directions on the objective card to earn even more points. A card, ranking and optimization game.

Dans Micronimo, capturez des cartes insectes 2 par 2 et regroupez-les par famille pour faire la plus belle des collections.
Plus une collection compte d’insectes, plus elle rapporte de points.
Suivez également les indications de la carte objectif pour gagner encore plus de points.
Un jeu de cartes, de classement et d’optimisation.

name: Boris News Game
description:
The yes or no game for those that love funny Boris Johnson quotes.


56 quotes from the man who invented Brexit
Try to decide if Boris said it or not
Answer correctly to win cards
Win the most cards to win the game
It’s a simple yes or no game. Or is it…


—description from the publisher

name: The Big Pub Quiz
description:
Bring all the fast-thinking fun of the pub quiz to your home with this trivia set that's bursting with questions!

Including 500 questions on everything from sports and pop culture to technology and movies, plus the ever-popular picture rounds, hosting your own pub quiz has never been easier. Simply pick your teams, open the box and get ready for an action-packed evening!

Set contains: 85-page question and answer pad with 500 questions and 10 picture rounds, 6 joker cards, dry wipe scoreboard, dry wipe pen, winners trophy and instructions.

name: La Taberna
description: The objective of the game is to fill the drawer with the six bottles of different colors. To achieve this, each player must answer questions and fulfill the requirements indicated by the "Tomo y Obligo" cards. The first player to get all 6 bottles and manage to stand up to complete one last requirement will be the winner.

name: Crackerdash
description:
There are six cheeses to visit on the board and six crackers on the plate. Go around the board, visit the cheeses and eat the crackers. The first to clear their placate of crackers wins! But watch out for the pesky cat squares as victory is never just one throw away!

—description from the publisher

name: Care Bears and the Magic Fountain
description: Recreate a 6 pieces puzzles in this turn and move game. One of the novelty is the pop-up board.

name: Plan: Z
description:
Plan: Z is a competitive card game for you and up to 3 friends where you will compete to be the last base standing in a retro video games overworld style zombie apocalypse. Players will balance Resource management with fighting off zombies and enemy Survivors, but watch out, building too fast or too slow can prove to be your own downfall. Can you outlast your friends and control the last bastion of mankind?

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Card Play Conflict Resolution, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Multi-Use Cards

name: Shan Khay
description:
Shan Khay is a game where you have to use math to win

You have to get the minimum number turning different bricks with figures from 1 to 9 (and 0). Brick have at their back the "Shan Khay" (finished with the unicorn logo at the end for the 0 figure) word. You roll two dices and you can turn several brick if the sum of their figures in the same than that of the two dices.

name: Stranger Things: Identité secrète
description:
Play as the heroes from Stranger Things and try to save Hawkins from the roaming monsters. Be careful: some characters could be corrupted by the Mind Flayer, hidden in the shadows, and could turn against their friends!

In this bluffing game with secret identities, each player try to accomplish their objective while preventing others to accomplish theirs!

Components:

1 board
2 pawns
1 rulebook
6 character cards
12 objective/corruption card
50 action cards
categories: Bluffing, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Party Game, Spies/Secret Agents

name: Joking Hazard: Freakpocalypse
description: 5 card expansion included in physical copies of the Cyanide & Happiness - Freakpocalypse (Episode 1) game for Switch, PS4 or PS5.
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Joking Hazard: Red Ranger Promo Card
description:
A promo card for Joking Hazard featuring the Red Ranger from Power Ranger.
It was given out at San Diego Comic Con 2018

It's red bordered, so it is an end card. It may be only placed at the end of the comic.
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Joking Hazard: Trover Saves The Universe Promo Card
description:
This card was given out at PAX East 2019.
It shows blue and green shirt guy high with Trover from the Game "Trover Saves the Universe"
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Island of Flowers
description:
Island of Flowers is a solo, card placement game in which the player will try to distribute flowers, in various stages, to all parts of the island. One each turn, match or pair icons together to fill your island. If you can place a card on every part of the island, you win!

In the two-player cooperative game, each player has the shared goal of distributing flowers to all parts of the island. Players will choose a character, which indicates the area of the island they are responsible to populate. Working as a team, you win together if you can place a card on every part of the island.

-description from designer
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Tile Placement

name: Where's Wally?: The card game
description:
Using the cards you can assemble "Wally in the beach" or "Wally in the airport", with 16 cards each in a 4x4 matrix.

The first player who finds Wally gets 10 points. But there are other 10 questions (1 point each) that you have to answer finding the information in the cards

name: Halloween
description:
In the game Halloween, players search a haunted castle for candies and try to avoid being cursed.

Player collect cards from the 12+1 rooms of the castle to get the best candy combos for victory points.

name: Hunt A Killer: Off the Record
description:
In Hunt A Killer: Off the Record, you play a 6-episode story and solve the mystery of the murder of Ashley Mendoza. Completing each episode solves one piece of the puzzle, and builds your case for the larger mystery.

Off the Record Box Set is a self-directed storyline perfect for experienced detectives looking to test their skills. After reporting on her town’s mayoral election, journalist Ashley Mendoza is found dead. Help her friend Frannie investigate Ashley’s death and expose her murderer.

Use your detective skills to decode ciphers, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover the truth.

For each episode:
Check the Objective Card in each box as your goal may change each episode.

Set aside time to dig into the box and read all the materials.

Examine the evidence to uncover critical clues, corroborate alibis, create timelines, and identify each suspect’s means, motive, and opportunity.

Difficulty: 4/5 - Medium

name: ひぐらしのなく頃に－我－ (Higurashi When They Cry: Ware)
description:
ひぐらしのなく頃に－我－ ("Higurashi When They Cry: Ware") is a hidden role game where everyone starts in the same situation and it's possible to play successfully without lying. At the beginning of the game everyone has one of each of seven role cards; over five in-game days, players will give each other votes and discard roles until only one is left, which determines who wins.

Each turn ("day"), a player may choose to either vote or destroy a vote. When you vote you give a vote token to any other player and discard your role cards for the day face down. When you destroy a vote, you discard one vote from any player, including yourself, and your discards for the day are face up. At the end of each of the first three days, all discards are shuffled and revealed in total, so you can follow approximately what cards are still in play.

Roles have a variety of victory conditions.

This game is different from 斯くして我は独裁者に成れり (Kakushite ware ha dokusaisha ni nareri, "And Thus I Became a Dictator...") as it includes a set of different cards, winning conditions and theme.

Note: The game can be played with up to 12 players, but one box only supports up to 6. For more than 6 players you will need to buy a second set and combine them.

—user summary

name: Lenny's Limo
description:
In the entertaining memo game "Lenny's Limo", the children drive through the city in their limousines and collect new passengers of a special kind such as Yetis, paddlers or a beach family. But watch out: only matching couples are allowed on board! All children start with a front and a rear part of their limousine. Whoever can place the most passenger tiles in between during the course of the game wins.

As in many memo games, two face down tiles are always revealed per turn. But "Lenny's Limo" is not about finding the exact counterparts, but about finding matching pairs that result in a common, funny motif. This can be the two yetis, the paddlers or the beach family.

name: Genius Παιχνίδι Γνώσεων
description: The players take turns and answer questions in order to be the first with a full set of colour cards (5 colour cards).

name: Scoppia la coppia
description:
Scoppia la coppia ("Clash of Couples") is already the must-have couples game to test your knowledge of your partner with questions about everyday life, personality traits and your intimacy…

Each turn, vote for the situation that suits you best and find out how well your partner knows you… or not! So, who will sleep on the sofa tonight?
Rules:
"Just the two of us" Version (2 Players):
ASK Draw a question card
VOTE Vote face down for the answer that suits you best
GUESS The other player in turn votes face down for the answer that best suits their partner
REVEAL Both flip their answer card over to reveal their answer
SCORE If the second player has the same vote as their partner, then the former scores 1 point
REPEAT Roles are inverted and a new round starts!
WIN When you want to stop the game, count your points to find out who the winner is.

"Clash of Couples" Version (2 or more couples mode) : same as the 2 player version, but this time couples are going to play against each other!

name: Fire in the Library: Forge Gloves Promo Card
description: A promo for the game. It lets the user gain two additional safe spaces to be used at any time on their turn.

name: The Shrimp Curse
description:
In The Shrimp Curse, players are competing in a trick-taking game, aiming to match low ranked cards and high ranked cards. The higher ranked cards show one or two fried shrimp icons, and the lower ranked cards show empty plates.

When a player wins a trick, any cards showing shrimp stay face up in front of themselves. If they later win plate cards, these can be matched and moved to a score pile. However, if a player acquires a plate before a shrimp, the plate is removed from the game.

Players who still have shrimp in front of them at the end of a hand cannot score positive points.

The person with the most points at the end of the game wins.

name: Scarabeo Da Viaggio
description: Scarabeo for two players is a quick and addictive edition of Scarabeo, the word game most loved by Italians. This edition is a head to head race to the last letter to score 150 points and win. The classic Scrabble game in a compact format that can be played wherever you want. The great novelty of this version are the letters of the international alphabet (J, K, W, X, and Y) which enrich the challenge with the possibility of creating meaningful words of English origin.
mechanics: Closed Drafting, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Grid Coverage, Ordering, Paper-and-Pencil, Spelling, Tile Placement

name: Cookie Run: High Five
description:
Cookie Run: High Five is a card game using the exchange mechanic. Players organize a team of five Cookies to fight in the Arena.

Players start with five facedown cards in their play areas. They either draw a card from the deck or draft the top card from the discard pile. And may exchange it with one of their cards in their play areas. The new card is placed faceup.

Players constantly do this and use the abilities on the cards, if they have any, until the deck runs out or a player reveals all of their cards.

The numbers on the cards are the scores. If a player has cards that share the same background(suit), only the card with the highest value counts.

-description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Video Game Theme

name: Magyar-török várháború
description:
This is an abstract strategy game for two players. One player controls the Kindom of Hungary, the other controls the Ottoman Empire.
Each player has armies with 1, 2 or 3 movement points, and a General. These game pieces can move between cities connected by land and sea routes.
The player who can first capture the enemy Leader and move one of his pieces to the opponents Capital is the winner of the game.

On the other side of the board, you can play a Rome - Carthage war with the same rules on a different map.
mechanics: Movement Points, Point to Point Movement

name: Kalandos utazás a Balaton körül
description:
The players in this game travel around Lake Balaton, the largest lake in Central Europe.
Players must pay for accomodation, food, beaches etc. while traveling. They can earn money by entering cities and answering questions about the local history, geography and other interesting things.
The player who can travel around the lake first is the winner of the game.
mechanics: Questions and Answers, Roll / Spin and Move, Track Movement

name: RisiKo! Napoli
description:
RisiKo! Naples is the classic strategy game that everyone knows and loves, but in a special and original edition, set in the city of Naples. This version for 3-4 players includes Territory cards depicting the iconic neighborhoods of Naples and Objective cards inspired by the historical rivalry between the neighborhoods of this famous Italian city.

On the board, the battlefield is the map of the city and its beautiful gulf. Choose which of the two modes to play: in the first, the player who manages to defeat all opponents wins; in the second, you can use the Time Attack rule.

This board game for ages 10 and up has been able to really entertain anyone over the course of time. If you love classic board games, it's time to explore the city of Naples with this edition of RisiKo! A board game for adults and children aged 10 and over.
All you need to start playing is 3-4 players.
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Area Movement, Area-Impulse, Dice Rolling, Player Elimination, Set Collection

name: Quickdraw
description:
Quickdraw is a quick-shooting game where, based on cards, you find out how to shoot and which target to hit. Whoever hits the target the fastest gets it as a point. Whoever has the most points after all the cards are played wins.

—user summary

name: Galactic Games
description:
Compete against each other alone or in teams, in seven different disciplines that require precision, skill and a bit of luck. Load the ring slinger, aim carefully and launch the rings.

The game is divided into seven separate branches consisting of different courses that are built on the table. With the help of your ring lunge, you must either hit the mark, be the fastest through a course or what is meant in the next branch. Each player gets points based on their position and whoever collects the most after seven branches wins.

—user summary

name: Pinball Game
description: Tabletop variant of a pinball game. Compete to get the highest score after four balls.

name: Alliance: Supergra Strategiczna
description:
Alliance: Supergra Strategiczna is a "Strategy and Diplomacy" multi-player board wargame that simulates a theoretical War in Europe in the '30s.
Seven Nations: Britain, France, Italy, Germany, Romania, Poland, and Turkey are trying to eliminate the competitors.
When four Nations are defeated (no more cities controlled) the remaining three nations share the victory.
Diplomacy is required to gain an advantage.

Gameplay - key rules:

All Players write down their commands on the paper, then all moves take place at the same time.
There are two types of orders: attack (move), or defend.
Attack or defend can be declared for the current territory or for the territory next to it.
Each unit can move to the territory that shares the border with the current one.
To conquer a hostile space - attacker power (number of units) needs to be higher than defender power.
Each year has two phases (Spring and autumn campaigns)
When the Year ends - units calculation takes place - for each conquered terrain - the player may build a new unit.
Special units = cost of 3 regular units.


Win Condition:
Each Nation starts with three cities, and when all cities are lost - that Nation is eliminated. When 4 Nations are eliminated - the game ends and the remaining 3 Nations share the victory.

Note: While this game may seem similar to the Alliace from Columbia Games, it has different mechanics, counties, and background.
categories: Abstract Strategy, Modern Warfare, Negotiation, Wargame

name: Gun It
description:
The Inertia Corporation is coming, after your crew discovered something about them you shouldn’t have. Now you must survive the onslaught surrounding you.

Gun It is a timed cooperative game in which 1-4 players are packed together in a car in the middle of a thriller.

Over a series of rounds, the crew must collaborate to shoot their way through a hostile array of cars, trucks, motorcycles, and more. Each round, players will have limited time to exchange cards determining who shoots and drives where, when, and with which equipment. Once time runs out, the action begins! But plan wisely, as vehicles explode, often causing collateral damage and chains of vehicle destruction that come back to blow up in your face.
Survive long enough to achieve your current scenario in style!

Each scenario has a victory condition with multiple levels of success. Each may require you to earn XP, create pileups, or eliminate rivals. If the crew ends in a wreck or you fail to complete the minimum victory condition, the game ends in failure!

—description from the designer
categories: Card Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Puzzle, Real-time
mechanics: Action Queue, Action Timer, Chaining, Cooperative Game, Programmed Movement, Real-Time, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game

name: Dice Theme Park: Zee Administrator Promo Card
description:
Originally available as part of Dice Tower's 2022 Kickstarter Pack C.

Once each round, you may use a Mascot as a Map or vice-versa.

name: マストフォローの建塔士 (Masuto Forō no Kentōshi)
description:
In マストフォローの建塔士, roughly "Must Follow Tower Builders", the players are erecting a tower through trick-taking.

Each card in the deck shows a specific 3D wooden piece. At the end of each trick, the players which followed suit will place the piece shown on their card onto a central tower. Points are gained for building higher, any parts of a piece which overhang the edge of the tower, and the person to win the trick. Points are lost if a player causes part of the tower to collapse.

The game ends when a player has 0 or fewer points or the hand is complete. The person with the most points wins.

name: Aetherstream: Interceptor – Terran Commonwealth Squadron Set
description:
The Terran Commonwealth Squadron contains ten fighter models, the same as in the Interceptor Core Box, along with 17 new pilot cards.
Also included are 8 blank fighter cards, 10 blank pilot cards, and an additional maneuver template.

name: Yokai Battle: Action Cards Expansion
description:
An expansion for Yokai Battle that adds action cards, as well as, new monsters to the game.

This expansion includes new type of cards to be added to players decks, named action cards, separated into three different types:
Spells are played and placed in the discard pile after resolving.
Traps are placed face-down on the board and activate when a monster is played on top of them.
Equipment are played on monsters to modify their characteristics.

Included are 18 action cards per player (6 spells, 6 traps, 6 equipment), and 8 new monsters per player.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Mythology
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Hand Management, Take That

name: Muumilaakson puuhapolku
description: Simple roll and move game for children in the Moomin world. If you land on an action space, you draw a card for some physical tasks like "skip around the players on one leg". Watch for Stinky to see if you should follow the card instructions or do the opposite.

name: Harry Potter: Houses in a Row
description:
This is a basic tile matching game based in the theme of Hogwarts house crests from the Wizarding world of Harry Potter.

It's a very simple and quick to learn game about drawing tiles and configuring them on the playspace.

This game is fairly quick to play, the first player successfully match up 4 of their house token will win.

Very simple concept but quite more enjoyable for a fan of Harry Potter or Wizarding world themed games.

name: Magic: The Gathering – Core Set 2019 Planeswalker Deck: Tezzeret, Cruel Machinist
description:
Planeswalker Decks familiarize players who are interested in Magic with basic strategy, plus the games setting, characters, and mechanics of the latest set. Each deck comes with a foil Planeswalker card not found anywhere else.

Tezzeret uses his ability to manipulate metal to fulfill his dark ambitions. Assemble a host of artifacts and turn them into deadly tools to engineer a cunning victory.

—description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Pencil Planner
description:
In this roll and write game for 1-4 players, planners are tasked with creating routes around the city that net them the most income. Use dice to draw paths through the city, and also to gain access to shops. At the end of 12 rounds, the player with the most money is the winner!

Pencil Planner is a print and play game designed by Wayne Koenig and published by Koenig Kreations. It is designed to be played with one sheet of paper and pencil per player, and 2 D6 dice. Whether you are playing this by yourself to get the highest score, or playing with friends we hope that the gameplay with keep bringing you back for more.

—description from the designer
categories: Dice, Economic, Print & Play, Puzzle, Transportation
mechanics: Automatic Resource Growth, Dice Rolling, Die Icon Resolution, Different Dice Movement, Drawing, End Game Bonuses, Grid Movement, Income, Line Drawing, Network and Route Building, Paper-and-Pencil, Point to Point Movement, Random Production, Set Collection

name: Sneezy Panda
description: A spinning, sneezing panda blows leaves and petals all over the place. Players race to get the petals back in the pandas basket before the music stops, playing either co-operatively to get all the petals or competitively to get all of their own coloured petals to win.
categories: Action / Dexterity, Animals, Children's Game, Real-time

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Champions – Chaos Campaign Deck
description:
Campaign decks allow those new to the Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Champions universe to quickly field an army and get straight into the action. There are 4 Campaign decks available each with their own individual playstyles.

For hundreds of years, the zealots of Chaos have torn through the realms looking to destroy all that stands in their way. Leading an army of the Chaos gods' chosen into battle is a brutal and bloody affair. Relying on self-damage and unit sacrifice to unleash their most furious attacks, the gods of Chaos will see blood flowing in abundance.

—description from the publisher

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Champions – Order Campaign Deck
description:
Campaign decks allow those new to the Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Champions universe to quickly field an army and get straight into the action. There are 4 Campaign decks available each with their own individual playstyles.

Stalwart and righteous warriors looking to free the Mortal Realms from the clutches of Chaos. The forces of Order are home to Stormcast Eternals and Idoneth Deepkin. Their strength lies in empowering individual units so that they can tear through the opposition while exercising precision board control.

name: Murder Mystery Party: Murder On The Underground
description:
Meghan Rogers, a young, aspiring scientist, has been found dead in a remote part of the London Underground, and murder cannot be ruled out. Now it's the players' turn to determine what really happened.

First, create the scene and build the murder board – a 750-piece jigsaw puzzle. Another five 50-piece mini-puzzles and the notes of the investigating officer provide additional missing pieces of evidence that help to get players on the trail of the murderer. Alone or in a team, combine witness statements, toxicology findings, and medical reports with other evidence and observations to track down the solution. Ready to solve the case?

name: Crocodile Snap
description:
Featuring 32 fun animal cards to match, players shout out 'snap!' for matching pairs, but when they spot a pair of crocodiles they must snap their arms instead! Children will love the quirky characters in this game, from a superhero crocodile to a gorilla drinking tea!

—description from the publisher

name: Colourfull
description:
Throw, place, turn, remove... and manage to draw the longest worm on your board to earn more points than anyone else.
Colourfull is a fun game for creating polyminoes from colored dice. Each participant, from his point of view, will paint them on his blackboard. But be careful, because these actions will make them change their shape, position or completely.

LAUNCH, PLACE, TURN, REMOVE...
The colored worms have escaped and we must recover as many as we can. You must take into account not to leave free spaces in your grid and above all color the maximum number of contiguous holes with the same color.

Whoever has the most points at the end of the game will win this colorful game.

name: 99 More BUILDZI Towers
description: Here's FIVE new types of tower cards with 99 more challenges for BUILDZI towers! Deal out these oversized cards and race to be first to stack - by Number, with one hand, 3D, by 'crazi-color (shape only), or 'flip-flop' (no colors at all).
categories: Action / Dexterity, Children's Game, Expansion for Base-game, Real-time

name: Irrgarten der Magier
description:
In Irrgarten der Magier (Magician's Maze), you and your fellow players need to help Linus move through the dark forest to collect thirteen objects before time runs out.

The playing area consists of two levels. On the ground level, you have a game board with plastic ridges that create barriers for movement. As you improve at the game, you can add hedges to the game board to create additional barriers. One player will move the young magician Linus across this board.

But Linus must travel with a star overhead so that he can find these objects in the dark. The second level of play is a plastic sheet that forms the sky. Another player will control a "magic button" that magnetically holds the star, which is attached to Linus, in the sky and keeps it from falling.

On a turn, reveal a route card; three spaces have targets on them, and the other three spaces will be filled with revealed target chips. After discussing how they want to move and starting the electronic timer, two players move Linus and the star (via the magic button) to one target after another until either they've visited all six targets or time has run out. If the star ever falls due to players moving in different directions, the players must first elevate the star again before moving.

Place each chip you've reached in slots in the timer and return unreached target chips face down to the supply. If you claim all thirteen targets by the end of twelve rounds of play, you win!

name: ワンダフルズー (Wonderful Zoo)
description:
ワンダフルズー (Wonderful Zoo) is a card game from Japan. Players try to build a better zoo than their opponents, using the special benefits different creatures provide, and tailoring the zoo to suit management cards that enhance the animals attraction. Through card drafting and special abilities, players build up a tableau for their zoo, scoring points as they progress. When the game ends, the player with the highest points total wins, having constructed their wonderful zoo.

The game has a deck of over 90 animals, and 10 different management cards. The game can be played solitaire, trying to build the best zoo possible.
user summary
mechanics: Hand Management, Interrupts, Open Drafting, Solo / Solitaire Game, Take That, Tile Placement, Variable Player Powers

name: Magic: The Gathering – Aether Revolt Planeswalker Deck: Ajani, Valiant Protector
description:
Take Back the Power

Get started playing Magic right away! Unite the rogue inventors of Kaladesh to build up an unstoppable force of renegades, ready to stand against corruption and retake the capital. Join forces with the mighty Planeswalker Ajani Goldmane--with a card unique to this deck--to claim your victory.

Contents:

Ready-to-play 60-card deck featuring a foil premium Ajani, Valiant Protector planeswalker card
2 Aether Revolt 15-card booster packs
Strategy insert
Magic quick reference card
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting

name: Murder Mystery Flexi Party: Murder at the Disco
description: New York, 1977. Hot dance club Disco 54 is celebrating a birthday but before anyone can 'get down' owner Doctor Disco is found dead in the VIP lounge! But whodunnit? Was it Foxy Casablancas, Brandy Pusskins, Angel Force, Soux Patroopa, Genoa Jackson, Poppi Grinder, Delphine Disco, Roland Slide, Tony Revolta, Chip Puncherello, Mo Town, Larry Gibb, Don Shaft or Mike Oxbig? A roller disco romp for up to 7 female and 7 male players.

name: CocoLocoColor
description:
CocoLocoColor its a party game where players have six different ways to play with its colorful deck:


The Fortune Teller: The goal is to be the first to run out of cards. The players must place the cards face down and in order they will have to throw a card while saying aloud one of the colors of the palette of the match. If you hit the color, you collect all the cards up to that point.



The Snake: The goal is to be the first to run out of cards. Players will have to place a card that says the color of the previous card. If a player cannot place any card from his hand, he must pass his turn. Each player can place as many cards as he can on his turn.



The Trident: The goal is to get as many trios as possible. Players can put the cards together if they all have the same color or the same word is written on them. The players must always have 6 cards in their turn, so they will have to take as many cards from the central deck as they have used.



The Duel: The goal is to be the first to run out of cards. Six cards are dealt to each player and the rest are placed, face down, forming a deck on the table. Players will take cards from the central deck at the same time and place them face up on the table. Then, they can put their hand on top of one of them if they can match it with a card from their hand. Every time a player gets a pair, he will discard those cards.



Pairs: The goal is to get as many pairs as possible. 6 cards are dealt to each player and 9 will be placed face down, forming a grid on the table. The rest of the cards are placed face down in a deck. Each player will pick up 3 cards in turn to memorize their content and quickly turn them over again. He will then search his hand for a card whose text matches one of the cards he had picked up. Only if a match is made will he continue to play. Each player can make up to 5 matches on their turn.



Stairs: The goal is to be the first to run out of cards. 6 cards are dealt to each player and the rest are placed face down in a central deck. The person who has one of the double cards will start playing, since each stair is formed starting from them. Each player will put a card in their turn and they will be completed according to the order of the colors of CocoLocoColor. In case of not being able to use any of the ones in his hand, he will take one from the central deck.
categories: Action / Dexterity, Card Game, Memory, Party Game, Real-time
mechanics: Hand Management, Memory, Pattern Recognition, Push Your Luck, Speed Matching, Take That

name: Lucky Pirate
description:
Lucky Pirate is a quick card game with a mix of skill and luck that can be played with 2-6 players. Players get to choose an even number of "up" and "down" cards to lay on the table in front of them and form a hand with the leftover cards. They then take turns playing a card to the middle. Generally each card must be equal or higher to the previous card played but some cards have special powers. Three of the same card in a row will remove the played cards from the game, but if a player finds themself unable to play on the current stack? They must take all the cards into their hand!

Play continues until someone has played all their hand cards, up cards, and down cards. They are then declared winner and Lucky Pirate Captain!

name: Trado
description: Try to build highest tower by cleverly buying blocks from auction. Money is limited and players do not get change from their bids. After all blocks have been auctioned, highest tower wins.

name: Twin Stars: Moonset – Scenario #3: Catch the Slayer
description:
A new episodic game that reimplements Twin Stars.

Each episode includes a Scenary postcard and 2 cards.

A few big updates from Twin Stars. A lot mostly in the visual side. It uses cubes, and it uses them on the card instead of using the edges of the card for tracking. Characters have skills, store items and other things on their cards. You can also gain Hide or Hunt. With Hide, you can re-roll an alert die (which is an extra die, not a die on an alert symbol), and Hunt allows you to try for an extra star.


Scenario: Catch the Slayer

An aristocratic named Peire reaches out in dire need of help. There has bee a string of deaths in Pahyrstm and every Friday morning a body has been found. The killer's identity is known, but they leave a note next to each body. At first the notes were vague, but they've slowly started to paint a picture. The evidence is showing thatyou have been the killers all along. Capture the killer before more victims are killed, and before you are blamed for the death.

Characters:

Rallyed Thilve
Nereayne
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Player Powers

name: まじかる☆ベーカリー外伝 パンとごはんの魔女裁判（ポテトもあるよ）(Magical Bakery Gaiden: Bread and Rice Witch Trials (And Potatoes Too!))
description:
In this side story to the Magical Bakery and Magical Kingdom games, a small village on the border between the Kingdom Panteria, the Country of Bread, and the Ricel Empire, the Country of Rice, all the villagers divide themselves up into the Bread Faction and the Rice Faction.

But the village has been cursed by the Witch of Confusion, and now everyone has forgotten which faction they belong to. Uncertainty and hostility grow wild, and every attempt to vote on which faction is more popular fails due to rampant fraud.

Into all this confusion came a young girl, who asked the innocent question:

Which do you prefer? Bread? Rice? Or maybe you like Potatoes instead?

In this card game, each player has a faction which is hidden to them, but visible to other players. Play cards and use deduction to figure out which faction you currently belong to, out think your opponents who will try and change your faction, and make your faction the majority.

name: Kukurykuuu!!! Bardzo zabawna gra rodzinna
description:
Simple rules, funny situations resulting from imitating animal voices and the possibility of playing together with adults are the advantages of this game. You will need: great reflexes, perceptiveness and a good... voice. A very fun educational game for kids and adults of all ages. The person with the most worm tokens wins.

—description from the publisher

Players filp over face down animal tiles. When a thrid animal of a kind is flipped the player who imitate the voice of that animal first receives a worm token. There is an exception for one animal - the rooster. Just one rooster is enough to trigger the players imitating this animal's voice and that gives the first player two worm tokens award. Anytime a player makes a mistake they loses one token. When all animal tiles are filpped, the game ends and the player with most worm tokens wins.

—user summary

name: Busy Beaver
description:
In this game you try to be the first to collect the three different trees. By rolling a die you can move across the board and whenever you land on a space that symbolizes a tree, you can look at the bottom of the tree and check if your bug is on it. If so, you can place the tree in your beaver dam.

—user summary

It’s time to build a dam with Barry the Beaver! Go around the forest and try to find trees with your own animal symbol in the base. Once you have spotted the right tree, Barry will cut it down and you can add it to your dam. The player, who has collected three different trees to their dam first, wins!

Wonderful 3D forest!
Wooden beaver character!
Fun and entertaining game for the whole family!

—description from the publisher

name: Drawsome Disney Edition
description:
Ever wondered what you'd look like as a Disney villain, or as Olaf? Find out in Drawsome Disney, a hilarious drawing party game from Ridley's Games!

Roll the dice at the beginning of each normal round to determine who everyone draws from their card, like a Mash Up combination of two characters or the movie companion of any character on their card. In the bonus round, cards will have challenges like drawing someone at the table as a specific character. The person with the most points at the end of five rounds wins.

name: Pick-Up Pete
description:
"The game of stacking chairs - Stack the chairs while PETE goes around"

Similar to the dexterity game Chairs, players again need to get rid of all of their small plastic chairs by stacking them on top of each other in turn... Only this time things are made doubly difficult by the fact that the chairs need to be stacked on Pick-Up Pete, a battery-operated pick-up truck that's slowly driving in circles on the table! While Pete offers many ways to stack and hang the chairs creatively, such as side mirrors, fenders etc. it is also quite tricky to load your chair on it as it trundles past, without tipping the whole stack of chairs already loaded.

First one to get rid of all their chairs wins.

Box has 2-4 players, but many marketing blurbs say 1-4, and this could be easily played as a solo challenge too.

name: Waffle Topple
description:
Waffle Topple is a game suitable for 2-6 players aged 6 and up. Players roll a die and try to add a waffle or topping piece to a stack of waffles without toppling it over. Each piece added earns one point, and bonus points are awarded for having the most waffle pieces in your pile and having one of each topping type (excluding waffle). The game is designed for friends, families, and waffle and brunch lovers, and has an average gameplay time of 10 minutes. The game includes 12 waffle pieces, 24 topping pieces, a balancing fork, a die, and instructions. The game's packaging is eco-friendly.

—description from the publisher

name: Treasure Hunt Game!
description:
Your treasure awaits, come seek, come find,
Follow the clues, don't get left behind!

One person prepares the trail of 10 clues. First clue is placed on the game board (e.g. BED). Next - in the location hinted by the clue (e.g. under the bed one puts TABLE card) etc. In the final location a treasure is placed. Once all clues are hidden, the game begins. Each time a player discovers a clue, they place it on the board for others to see and may get a jewel. The game ends when the treasure is found.

The game can be played in a competitive mode, in which the person with most jewels at the end wins, or in a coop mode, in which everyone wins once the treasure is found.

name: Misconceptions
description: In Misconceptions, you work with your team to separate the "Facts" from the "Misconceptions". Be careful, though, because some of the cards were added by the other team to confuse you.

name: Journey With Paul
description:
This game is based upon the overall journeys of St Paul, as told within the Acts of the Apostles.

It was created by the Boys' Brigade in 1985, intended for 2-6 players aged 8 and upwards.

Players progress along the map which details the journeys of the Apostle Paul by rolling dice and collecting travel tokens, as well as reading Bible verses to learn more about the early Christian Church.

—user summary

name: High & Low
description:
In High & Low, a quick card game for 2-4 players, players will be playing cards numbered 1-5 to a 5x5 tableau. If they play into a row or column with, respectively, a higher or lower value than all other rows/columns, they must take a High or Low token. The goal of the game is to collect an equal number of high and low tokens.

Lowest score wins (most numerous token type minus less numerous), with a couple variants for tiebreakers in case there is a tie.

The challenge comes in anticipating opportunities to collect tokens on subsequent turns, so as not to get stuck late without good options. Thus it includes aspects of hand management and anticipating opponent play.

The game can be played with a couple standard card decks, removing 25 cards numbered 1-5 (5 of each), in addition to chips or other generic component to act as High and Low tokens. A full rules document is available in the game's file section here on Board Game Geek.

—description from the designer

name: ESCAPE Dysturbia Weekly calendar: Pandemonium
description:
Tension mounts at Illumina University when Dr. Emma Lindberg disappears without a trace. In her wake, a trail of destruction: a damaged telescope, an erased hard drive, and the ashes of every shred of research she'd ever written. But that’s not all – eerie symbols etched into the floor suggest an unspeakable darkness has been unleashed.

The university turns to your detective agency for answers, and as you begin to peel back the layers of this mystery, you discover that the forces at play are far beyond anything you've encountered before. And as the clock ticks, you realize that the fate of the entire metropolis may rest in your hands...

"Pandemonium" is a 120-page desk calendar packed with 52 puzzles and a captivating storyline set in the dark and gloomy metropolis of Dysturbia.

name: HIJACK
description:
HIJACK is a card game about terrorists taking over a plane and trying to get away with it, with the most cash in hand, by the time the plane has landed, crashed, or exploded in mid-air.

It is played without turns: as and when they choose, everyone just announces which card they're going to play, and on whom. An example exchange of cards might be:

Ady reveals that he is the pilot, and tells the others not to kill him because he is the only person able to land the plane. (There is only one PILOT card in the deck.) But Beth has a PARACHUTE card, so doesn't care if the plane crashes; she plays a SHOOT card on Ady, who avoids that with a DODGE. Colin has the other PARACHUTE and also SHOOTs at Ady. Deb has a FLUKE card, so she could save Ady with that, but she also has a SURVIVOR card so expects to walk away from the inevitable plane crash, should the pilot die, so she withholds that for later. Beth reveals her PARACHUTE card and jumps out of the plane. But Colin then plays PROPELLOR, which makes a gruesome mess of Beth. He then jumps out of the plane as well, surviving the crash with a total of $7m in CASH cards. Deb is the last player on the plane, so plays her SURVIVOR card to walk away with $9m CASH and wins the round.

name: Roll in 1: Golf Dice Game
description:
A golf dice game with numbered dice. Players take turn rolling the dice to attempt to win by getting the lowest score.

How to play:
Roll all nine dice. Remove the dice with the lowest score(s). Players are required to remove at least one dice, but players are allowed to remove more than one if they wish. Then the player must choose the dice in the order of the hole in the scorebosrd. (Par 3,4, or 5). Repeat the first two steps until all nine dice have been selected. The player then adds up the numbers on all dice to get their nine hole score. Lowest score wins.

name: Hoot or Toot
description:
You probably have heard Mr. Owl hooting, but have you ever heard him tooting?
